issue.title: scene_info does not reflect older changes to visuals

content.raw:
Dear Nathan, Ian, Stefan,

I've attached a possible fix for this issue as a patch against the current Gazebo trunk (revision 22830), which adds a topic ("/gazebo/VISUAL_NAME/visual_updates") to each Visual that "re-publishes" visual update messages.
A Link subscribes to this topic for each Visual it creates on instantiation, and updates the visual message entry for a Visual when an update is "re-published".

This doesn't use the "~/model/modify" topic as suggested before, but it allows new clients that connect to a running simulation to retrieve the current attributes of Visual instances via a "scene_info" request.

If it is useful/helpful, I could also add (or implement this instead) the ability to process Visual updates in "Link::ProcessMsg".

With best regards,
Fabian Aichele
